ninja.leaping.configurate

Class ConfigurationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions

  • public class ConfigurationOptions
extends Object
    This object is a holder for general configuration options. This is meant to hold options that are used in configuring how the configuration data structures are handled, rather than the serialization configuration that is located in ConfigurationLoaders
